attributes.action: Make it compulsory for every mp disclose every single expense they claim for right down to the last penny.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ultimately an MPs job is to serve the people of this country. For to long they have wasted and squandered taxpayer’s money. If MPs are made accountable and have to disclose what they claim for, it will stop this waste of valuable money. 
Also a BBC reporter claimed last night that MPs were so worried about this information becoming public that if and when it does so many will be forced to resign through embarrassment.
For me that says it all, under the freedom of information act 2000 this information should already be available in full and uncensored.

STOP THE WASTE !!!!!!

Andrew Rickerby

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
